name: Betrayal
stats: Maddie always targets Ambessa's target with her Ability and attacks. Every round where either gets at least 2 kill, gain a Maddie.

name: What Could Have Been
stats: Vander gains 30 permanent max Health each time Silco casts. Silco gains 6 permanent Ability Power each time Vander dies.

name: Geniuses
stats: When Heimerdinger casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages, each dealing 33% damage. When Ekko casts, Heimerdinger fires 3 missiles, each dealing 105% damage.

name: Martial Law
stats: When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing 225% damage. Ambessa gains 30% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.

name: Menaces
stats: Powder gains Dominator but no longer benefits from Family. When her monkey explodes, it creates 3 of Silco's monstrosities.

name: Reunion
stats: When Vi casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages towards her target each dealing 50% damage. When Ekko casts, Vi slams an earthquake towards his target dealing 150% damage.

name: Sisters
stats: When Jinx scores a takedown, Vi gains 40% bonus Attack Damage for 7 seconds. When Vi scores a takedown, Jinx gains 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

name: Unlikely Duo
stats: Jinx and Sevika gain 10% Attack Damage and 150 Health. Whenever one casts, they grant the other 15 mana. Sevika's arm is luckier.
